popularityCurve.label: for a representative democracy ceases to exist the moment that the public functionaries are by any means absolved from their responsibility to their constituents and this happens whenever the constituent can be restrained in any manner from speaking writing or publishing his opinions upon any public measure or upon the conduct of those who may advise or execute it

clusterList.phrase: for a representative democracy ceases to exist the moment that the public functionaries are by any means absolved from their responsibility to their constituents and this happens whenever the constituent can be restrained in any manner from speaking writing or publishing his opinions upon any public measure or upon the conduct of those who may advise or execute it
